channel.title: Not logging in
channel.description:
right i am new and i have regestered my acount and activated it but it wont let me log on to the new client why?
i put in my exact username and password but it wont log on
plz help
thanks chris

item.title: Not logging in
item.dc:creator: @yeha_x_d yeha x d
item.description:
@yeha_x_d wrote:

when you login what does the client say…

for example if I typed an incorrect password it would say
‘invalid username or password’

what message did you get?
